resources.string:
Welcome to Challonger.

Click "Ok" to be taken to the settings page to add your API Key.

The API Key is required to access Challonge through this app.
Get your API key from http://challonge.com/settings/developer/
Copy and paste it into the box below and click "Save API Key":
URL: challonge.com/{url} - (letters, numbers, and underscores only)
Organisation: {organisation}.challonge.com/url - (Requires write access to the specified organisation)
Description/instructions to be displayed above/with the bracket:
Maximum number of participants in the bracket. (Leave blank or 0 for no cap. Minimum cap is 4 players.)
Have Challonge host a sign-up page? (Otherwise, you manually add all participants)
Make private - Hides the tournament from the public browsable index and your profile.
Include a 3rd place match between semifinal losers? (Single Elimination only)
No API key entered. Please try again.
API key is too short. Please check and try again.
API key is too long. Please check and try again.
No Organisation entered. Please try again.
No URL entered. Please try again.
Unauthorized - Invalid API Key or Insufficent Permissions.
404 not found. Please check and try again.
Requested format is not supported - request JSON or XML only. You should not see this. If you do please contact the developer.
Validation error(s) for create or update method. Does your input exist? Check input and try again.
Something went wrong with Challonge. If you keep recieving this contact the developer and/or Challonge
No internet connection detected. Please check connection and try again.
Cannot change type of underway or complete tournament.
Edit Mode currently disabled. Cannot add participant.
Cannot add participant to underway or complete tournament.
Enter the new tournament name (Max: 60 Characters):
Enter the new tournament sign up cap: (Leave blank or 0 for no sign up cap. Minimum cap is 4 players.)
Have Challonge host a sign-up page (otherwise, you manually add all participants)
Edit Tournament Organisation. Will change tournament url.
Cannot edit sign up url on a started tournament.
Changing organisation or url currently not supported.
Start a tournament, opening up first round matches for score reporting. The tournament must have at least 2 participants:
Finalize a tournament that has had all match scores submitted, rendering its results permanent:
Reset a tournament, clearing all of its scores and attachments. You can then add/remove/edit participants before starting the tournament again:
Deletes a tournament along with all its associated records. There is no undo, so use with care:
The name displayed in the bracket/schedule - not required if Challonge Username is provided. Must be unique per tournament:
Provide this if the participant has a Challonge account. He or she will be invited to the tournament:

Providing this will first search for a matching Challonge account. If one is found, this will have the same effect as the "Challonge Username" attribute. If one is not found, the user will be invited via email to create an account:
The participant\'s new seed. Must be between 1 and the current number of participants. Overwriting an existing seed will automatically bump other participants as you would expect.

The participant\'s new seed. Must be between 1 and the current number of participants. Overwriting an existing seed will automatically bump other participants as you would expect. Leave blank to add participant to bottom seed.
No Display Name or Challonge Username is provided. At least one is required.
Participant cap reached. Cannot add new participant.
No sign up url to open.
WARNING: If you change the winner of a completed match, all matches in the bracket that branch from the updated match will be reset.
The winner you selected does not match the result of the scores you entered (assuming high score wins). Click Cancel to make changes or OK to submit as is.

How to use:

• Add your API key to the "Settings" tab.

• Find tournament through "Menu" tab.

• Create tournament through "Create" tab.

- Edit tournament info:
• Click Menu button/icon -> Check "Edit Mode"
• Long Click on tournament information item to edit.
• Start/Reset/Finalize/Delete tournament by long clicking "State" item.

- Update match:/n• Click Menu button/icon -> "Enable Editing"/n• Single click score to add 1. Long click score to minus 1.
• Click on winning player -> Save Match Information.

- Add participant (if tournament not started):
• Click Menu button/icon -> "Enable Editing"
• Click Menu button/icon -> Add participant

- Edit/Remove participant:
 • Click Menu button/icon -> "Enable Editing"
• Long click on participant.

Challonger v1.0.5

Unofficial Challonge App for Android

App by Mahesh Makani (@coldlink_)

Source: https://github.com/coldlink/challonger
